author: rovere
body:
In the AlcaBeamMonitor package there are several histograms which plot quantities vs LS. When plotting these with any overlaid reference, the default normalisation kicks in, making the interpretation of the results impossible. Therefore all such histograms have been flagged as "efficiency plots" so that the DQMGUI knows that they should not be normalised.
Expect no difference.
title: Fix alca beam monitor ls histograms
